title: F1's great comebacks: five times drivers won from the back of the grid
summary: Two decades on from his unforgettable charge from 17th to victory in Suzuka, Kimi Räikkönen’s 2005 triumph remains one of Formula 1’s greatest comebacks, but it's not the only one

qa_pairs.question: Which driver famously won from 17th on the grid at the 2005 Japanese Grand Prix?
In which year did Kimi Räikkönen achieve his remarkable comeback victory at Suzuka?
What is a significant aspect of Kimi Räikkönen's 2005 victory that is often highlighted in Formula 1 history?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It is considered one of the greatest comebacks.
wrong_options: It was during a rain-affected race
